mapper.select: /*SELECT M.MEMBER_NUMBER, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMEBER_SIGNUP_DATE, P.POINT_PRICE, O.ORDER_NUMBER, O.ORDER_TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM TBL_MEMBER M , TBL_POINT P , TBL_ORDER O WHERE M.MEMBER_NUMER = P.MEMBER_NUMBER AND M.MEBER_NUMBER= O.MEMBER_NUMBER*/ SELECT DISTINCT M.MEMBER_NUMBER , M.MEMBER_NAME , M.MEMBER_ID , M.MEMBER_SIGNUP_DATE , P.POINT_PRICE , O.ORDER_NUMBER , O.ORDER_TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM TBL_MEMBER M INNER JOIN TBL_POINT P ON M.MEMBER_NUMBER = P.MEMBER_NUMBER INNER JOIN TBL_ORDER O ON M.MEMBER_NUMBER = O.MEMBER_NUMBER
